thread.title: Which October Release Excites You More? Vote Between Rudramadevi, Bruce Lee And Akhil
thread.title_full: Which October Release Excites You More? Vote Between Rudramadevi, Bruce Lee And Akhil

title: Which October Release Excites You More? Vote Between Rudramadevi, Bruce Lee And Akhil
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
With back to back big releases lined up this October, it is going to be a feast for Telugu movie buffs. 
Rudramadevi is about to step in first in the race. After a long wait the film is releasing on 9 October. The next in the race is Ram Charan's Bruce Lee , which is releasing on 16 October and Akkineni scion's debut movie Akhil comes third as it is slated to hit screens on 23 October. 
All the three biggies are already overstuffed with special ingredients to pull the audience to theaters and coincidentally, all the three films are also releasing in Tamil this month, making the box office war more interesting. 
Apparently, After the phenomenal success of Baahubali and Srimanthudu , these are the prominent films that are testing their luck at the box office and are expected to garner never seen before figures, according to the analysis of Trade pundits. 
In addition, Rudramadevi comes with a grandeur which makes it a must a watch and Bruce Lee has Megastar's cameo which would obviously attract large crowds while Akhil has great attention since it is the debut film of one of the promising star kids. 
We understand it is a tough task to chose one among these three but however, check out the trailers of the films below and let us know on which film did you pin your hopes high, by leaving your comments below in the comment below. Which October Release Excites You More? 1/5
